title: Kate Middleton’s brother James gets engaged to French girlfriend
text:
Alizee Thevenet and James Middleton could soon be attending their own wedding (Picture: Getty Images Europe)

The Duchess of Cambridge’s youngest sibling has popped the question to Alizee Thevenet, according to reports.

James Middleton, 32, got engaged in secret – slipping a sapphire ring on his French city worker girlfriend and they plan to formally announce it next week.

The whirlwind romance blossomed following a chance encounter last year.

Middleton, who runs personalised greeting card company Boomf, broke up with girlfriend-of-five-years, actress Donna Air, at the beginning of 2018.

He would later meet Alizee at the South Kensington Club when she said ‘hello’ to his cocker spaniel Ella.

They posted a photograph of themselves together on Instagram (Picture: @jmidy)

The couple were then spotted kissing during a Middleton winter family holiday to St Barts in the Caribbean.

The pair moved in together in west London, it was revealed last month.

One of their friends told the Mail: ‘They’ve got engaged. Alizee has been wearing a beautiful sapphire sparkler.

‘They’ve been keeping the engagement secret, but news has started to leak out among their friends. They’ll be announcing it formally next week.’

According to Miss Thevenet’s father, Jean-Gabriel Thevenet, she was charmed by Mr Middleton’s suave British demeanor and is ‘deliriously happy’ with the businessman.

Miss Thevenet grew up in Chile, Indonesia and Belgium and is a keen skier. She moved to Britain six years ago and has a masters degree in investment and finance from Queen Mary University of London.

There may be plenty of royal interest in their wedding if Pippa Middleton’s big day is anything to go by with Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge and her children Prince George of Cambridge and Princess Charlotte of Cambridge at all the Englefield Green church near Windsor Castle (WPA Pool/Getty)

Prince George and Prince Charlotte ensure Middleton weddings are big occasions (Picture: Getty Images Europe)

James will be last of Michael and Carole Middleton’s children to wed.

Kate and Prince William tied the knot in 2011 while Pippa married businessman James Mathews in 2017.

Kate and William’s two eldest children Prince George and Princess Charlotte were among the wedding party.
